articles.content: Black TikTok creators are refusing to choreograph dances to Megan Thee Stallions new song, Thot Shit, in an effort to gain recognition for their content which has been co-opted by white creators on t… [+1742 chars]

articles.title: Meghan Markle set for big Montecito bash as Duchess of Sussex prepares for 40th birthday - Daily Express
articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE could follow in the footsteps of her Montecito neighbours and have a 'big, fancy' birthday party for her 40th at the end of summer, a royal commentator has suggested.

articles.title: Coronation Street betrayal as Alina Pop's baby is not Tyrone's in Adam affair twist? - Express
articles.description: CORONATION STREET'S Alina Pop thinks she's pregnant next week, but what if the baby is not Tyrone Dobbs'?

articles.content:
Tom DeLonge and Travis Barker have offered their love and support for Blink-182 bassist/vocalist Mark Hoppus following his revelation that he has been diagnosed with cancer.
